name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  In addition to noting stylistic strategies for revision and improved clarity, we will focus on the preparation and planning needed for a research paper – on the kinds of questions and arguments which could potentially lead to a viable Senior Writing Project.
schedule:
1:　　Introduction
2-4: 　　Arguments
4-8:  　　Style I (Clarity)
9:  　　Midterm
10-14:  Style II (Paragraph organization)
15-17:  Developing Project Topics
scorePolicy:
Writing Assignments / Class work: 50%
Final project: 50%
Attendance: a combination of 5 absences or late days =  -10 points from course grade
